content: I think I can live without the built-in cable for now. I already have a few spare cables lying around, and it's not a big deal for me to carry one extra. Plus, I'd rather save the extra cash. So, I'll just get the standard Anker PowerCore 10,000. Thanks for the advice! By the way, do you think I should get a screen protector for my new phone case, or is it not necessary?
